snippet: Wise Dan, the reigning horse of the year, won the $500,000 Fourstardave Handicap at Saratoga Race Course in Saratoga Springs, N.Y.
lead_paragraph: Wise Dan, the reigning horse of the year, won the $500,000 Fourstardave Handicap at Saratoga Race Course in Saratoga Springs, N.Y.

headline.main: Wise Dan Wins on Turf at Saratoga
headline.print_headline: Wise Dan Wins on Turf at Saratoga
